member.summary: Collection of flags indicating various options for the bitmap.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfo.HighBit
member.summary: Indicates the high bit of the image data (valid only for grayscale 12 or 16-bit data).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfo.LowBit
member.summary: Indicates the low bit of the image data (valid only for grayscale 12 or 16-bit data).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfo.Order
member.summary: Indicates the data order (grayscale, BGR, RGB, etc).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfo.PlaneCount
member.summary: Indicates whether the image data should be interleaved or planar.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfo.ViewPerspective
member.summary: Indicates the expected orientation of the image data.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.ChangeToImageOptions
member.summary: Options to use when changing a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage object to GDI+ System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ChangeToImageOptions.None
member.summary: Default

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ChangeToImageOptions.ForceChange
member.summary: If the image is not GDI+ compatible, this flag forces the conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ChangeToImageOptions.NoPalette
member.summary: Fail if the image has a palette.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ChangeToImageOptions.TopLeftAlways
member.summary: Force the image to have RasterViewPerspective.TopLeft view perspective.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.ConvertFromImageOptions
member.summary: Options to use when converting a GDI+ System.Drawing.Bitmap to LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage object.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ConvertFromImageOptions.None
member.summary: Default

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.ConvertToImageOptions
member.summary: Options to use when converting a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage object to GDI+ System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ConvertToImageOptions.None
member.summary: Default

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ConvertToImageOptions.InitAlpha
member.summary: Initialize the destination image alpha values if supported (when the result of the conversion is a 32 or 64-bit image). If this flagged is specified, the result image will always have an alpha value of all 1's (255 for 32-bit images or 65535 for 64-bit images) regardless of the alpha values in the source image. This can be useful when converting some 32-bit images that may have 0 for the alpha (such as BMP files) which translates into an GDI+ image that is completely transparent. If this flag is not specified, then the source image alpha values will be used as is.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.ImageIncompatibleReason
member.summary: Indicates the reason that the LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage object is not compatible with GDI+.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ImageIncompatibleReason.Compatible
member.summary: Image is compatible

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ImageIncompatibleReason.BitsPerPixel
member.summary: Unsupported Bits/Pixel

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ImageIncompatibleReason.Order
member.summary: Unsupported color byte order

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ImageIncompatibleReason.Palette
member.summary: Unsupported palette

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ImageIncompatibleReason.Data
member.summary: Unsupported raw data

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ImageIncompatibleReason.ViewPerspective
member.summary: Unsupported view perspective

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.ImageIncompatibleReason.Other
member.summary: Unspecified reason

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction
member.summary: Used to identify the callbacks in a RasterPaintCallbacks class.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.IsCompatibleDCCallback
member.summary: This callback checks whether the DC is compatible with a particular RasterPaintDibInfo class.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.GetDeviceCapsCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the GetDeviceCaps GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.SetStretchBltModeCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the SetStretchBltMode GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.IntersectClipRectCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the IntersectClipRect GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.SaveDCCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the SaveDC GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.RestoreDCCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the RestoreDC GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.StretchDIBitsCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the StretchDIBits GDI function. Use it to perform the actual painting.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.SetViewportOrgExCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the SetViewportOrgEx GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.GetViewportOrgExCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the GetViewportOrgEx GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.SelectPaletteCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the SelectPalette GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.RealizePaletteCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the RealizePalette GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.GetMapModeCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the GetMapMode GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.ExtSelectClipRgnCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the ExtSelectClipRgn GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.GetGraphicsModeCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the GetGraphicsMode GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.GetWorldTransformCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the GetWorldTransform GDI function.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.ConvertLineCallback
member.summary: This callback converts a line of data.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.GetDibInfoCallback
member.summary: This callback provides information on the data expected by the device. See RasterPaintDibInfo for more details.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.PrePaintCallback
member.summary: This callback informs your RasterPaintCallbacks class that it has been selected for painting. It is called before painting starts. Use it to allocate any memory needed for painting.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.PostPaintCallback
member.summary: This callback gets called after painting is finished. Use it to free any memory allocated in PrePaintCallback.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterImagePaintCallbackFunction.FillRectCallback
member.summary: This callback replaces the FillRect GDI function.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfoFlags
member.summary: Flags that make up RasterPaintDibInfo.Flags.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfoFlags.None
member.summary: No flags are set

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfoFlags.IgnoreLut
member.summary: Ignore the raster image color lookup (LUT) table when performing color conversion. This is valid only for grayscale images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDibInfoFlags.LowHighBitValid
member.summary: LowBit and HighBit members of RasterPaintDibInfo are valid. This is valid only for grayscale images.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags
member.summary: Contains value that controls the speed, quality, and style of painting operations.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.None
member.summary: Default

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.OrderedDither
member.summary: Enables or disables ordered dithering when painting. Ordered dithering is faster than the default dithering method, which uses error diffusion, but the quality of the image is not as good.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.FastPaint
member.summary: Enables or disables fast painting. Fast painting should be performed only if the current video driver is good, and the image does not need to be dithered or resized to paint. No safety check for a faulty driver is performed.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.IndexedPaint
member.summary: Enables or disables painting that is mapped directly to the selected palette. You can this and let Windows do color matching between the paint palette and the selected palette. Indexed painting uses the colors from the currently selected palette. It is not used if the image is not palletized.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.DitheredPaint
member.summary: Enables or disables painting that is mapped directly to the selected palette. This is enabled by default; you can set this flag to disable it and let Windows do color matching between the paint palette and the selected palette. Indexed painting uses the colors from the currently selected palette. It is not used if the image is not palletized.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.ScaleToGray
member.summary: (Document/Medical only) Enables grayscaling of 1-bit images when they are displayed. This improves the readability of the images when they are zoomed in or zoomed out, but it slows down the display.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.HalftonePrint
member.summary: Enables use of the printing halftone (rather than the viewing halftone) when painting to a 1-bit device.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.FavorBlack
member.summary: (Document/Medical only) Enables a bias in preserving black objects when displaying zoomed-out 1-bit images. This can prevent the disappearance of fine lines and details, but it slows down the display.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.FixedPalette
member.summary: Enables the LEAD Fixed palette when displaying 24-bit (or greater) images on 8-bit (or less) devices.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.NetscapePalette
member.summary: Enables the Netscape Fixed palette when displaying 24-bit (or greater) images on 8-bit (or less) devices.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.Resample
member.summary: Enables resample resize when displaying images at zoom factors other than 1:1.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintDisplayModeFlags.Bicubic
member.summary: Enables bicubic resize when displaying images at zoom factors other than 1:1.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintEngine
member.summary: Indicates the painting engine to use when rendering images using the Windows GDI or GDI+ engines..

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintEngine.Gdi
member.summary: Use Windows GDI when painting Leadtools.RasterImage objects

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintEngine.GdiPlus
member.summary: Use Windows GDI+ when painting Leadtools.RasterImage objects

member.name: T:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties
member.summary: Controls the speed, quality, and style used when painting a Leadtools.RasterImage object using the Windows GDI or GDI+ engines.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.MakeRasterOperation(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a ROP4 value from the specified foreground and background color values.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.Default
member.summary: Returns a new instance of the RasterPaintProperties structure with all members set to default values.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.Opacity
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the opacity to use when painting the Leadtools.RasterImage.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.PaintCallbacks
member.summary: Gets the list of RasterPaintCallbacks objects containing the custom callbacks.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.PaintDisplayMode
member.summary: Gets and sets options that control the speed, quality, and style of painting operations.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.PaintEngine
member.summary: Gets and sets the paint engine to use when displaying images.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.RasterOperation
member.summary: Gets or sets the ROP value.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.UsePaintPalette
member.summary: Enables or disables automatically using the Leadtools.RasterImage object palette when displaying the image.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.UseTransform
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicate wherer to use the current transform in the destination System.Drawing.Graphics object when painting the image and regions.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.Blackness
member.summary: Fills the destination rectangle using the color associated with index 0 in the physical palette. (This color is black for the default physical palette.)

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.DestinationInvert
member.summary: Inverts the destination rectangle.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.MergeCopy
member.summary: Merges the colors of the source rectangle with the brush currently selected in hdcDest, by using the Boolean AND operator.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.MergePaint
member.summary: Merges the colors of the inverted source rectangle with the colors of the destination rectangle by using the Boolean OR operator.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.NotSourceCopy
member.summary: Copies the inverted source rectangle to the destination.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.NotSourceErase
member.summary: Combines the colors of the source and destination rectangles by using the Boolean OR operator and then inverts the resultant color.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.PatternCopy
member.summary: Copies the brush currently selected in hdcDest, into the destination bitmap.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.PatternInvert
member.summary: Combines the colors of the brush currently selected in hdcDest, with the colors of the destination rectangle by using the Boolean XOR operator.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.PatternPaint
member.summary: Combines the colors of the brush currently selected in hdcDest, with the colors of the inverted source rectangle by using the Boolean OR operator. The result of this operation is combined with the colors of the destination rectangle by using the Boolean OR operator.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.SourceAnd
member.summary: Combines the colors of the source and destination rectangles by using the Boolean AND operator.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.SourceCopy
member.summary: Copies the source rectangle directly to the destination rectangle.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.SourceErase
member.summary: Combines the inverted colors of the destination rectangle with the colors of the source rectangle by using the Boolean AND operator.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.SourceInvert
member.summary: Combines the colors of the source and destination rectangles by using the Boolean XOR operator.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.SourcePaint
member.summary: Combines the colors of the source and destination rectangles by using the Boolean OR operator.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Drawing.RasterPaintProperties.Whiteness
member.summary: Fills the destination rectangle using the color associated with index 1 in the physical palette. (This color is white for the default physical palette.)
